## ZipArchive.Convert.systemConfiguration variable

Validator for system configuration (delegates to config packlet) This validates that the parsed JSON conforms to the system configuration schema

**Signature:**

```typescript
systemConfiguration: Validator<ConfigModel.ISystemConfiguration>
```
